about_the_game:
Unbox Tactics is a rogue-like, turn-based tactical game that challenges you to strategically lead your party through procedurally generated dungeons. Each character is unboxed with unique abilities, and it's up to you to form the ultimate party to tackle an ever-evolving array of enemies and obstacles.

As you progress through dungeons, you’ll earn gold and resources by defeating enemies and clearing challenges. These resources allow you to unlock and unbox new characters, each bringing distinct skills and combat styles to your party. Additionally, you’ll encounter various items during your runs that can be combined to create powerful synergies, enabling your party to overcome tougher foes with enhanced tactics.

Beyond the immediate dungeon-crawling experience, Unbox Tactics offers meta-progression in the form of permanent upgrades. Between runs, you can invest in long-term upgrades that enhance your characters or provide your party with extra advantages for future attempts. This system allows you to grow stronger with each run, even if you fall short, ensuring that every attempt brings you closer to victory.

Each character is unboxed with unique abilities, and it's up to you to form the ultimate party to tackle an ever-evolving array of enemies and obstacles.

These resources allow you to unlock and unbox new characters, each bringing distinct skills and combat styles to your party. Additionally, you’ll encounter various items during your runs that can be combined to create powerful synergies, enabling your party to overcome tougher foes with enhanced tactics.

Beyond the immediate dungeon-crawling experience, Unbox Tactics offers meta-progression in the form of permanent upgrades. Between runs, you can invest in long-term upgrades that enhance your characters or provide your party with extra advantages for future attempts. This system allows you to grow stronger with each run, even if you fall short, ensuring that every attempt brings you closer to victory.
name: Unbox Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Unbox Tactics is a rogue-like, turn-based tactical game where you command a team of characters, each unboxed with unique skills and abilities. Strategically plan your moves and assemble the ultimate party as you take on intense, tactical battles.
